column2: 東京都統計年鑑（平成30年）TOKYO STATISTICAL YEARBOOK ( 2018 )　18  社会保障 18  SOCIAL SECURITY

column4: 18-8  医療保険 (1) 全国健康保険協会管掌健康保険 b 保険給付費・医療費（平成28～30年度）18-8  HEALTH INSURANCE (1) MANAGED BY JAPAN HEALTH INSURANCE ASSOCIATION b INSURANCE BENEFIT PAYMENTS AND MEDICAL CARE EXPENSES ( Fiscal Years 2016-2018 )
各年度3月分の数値である。
Figures for March of each fiscal year.

a) Meals and living expenses during hospitalization (excluding payment covering the difference with standard copayments)  b) Meals and living expenses during hospitalization (payment of the difference with standard copayments)  c) Sick/injury leave allowances  d) Lump-sum allowances for childbirth and childcare
注) 「保険給付費」及び「医療給付費」の件数には，「入院時食事療養費・生活療養費（標準負担額差額支給分を除く）」は含まれていない。

Note: "Meals and living expenses during hospitalization (excluding payment covering the difference with standard copayments)" are not included  in the cases of "insurance benefits" and "medical care benefits."
資料：全国健康保険協会 Source: Japan Health Insurance Association
